content: There is expressions in SearchParams - Condition.onset.as(Quantity), but Condition.onset[x] does not include Quantity type (the same about Condition.abatiment[x])
could you create at gForge task for that please
What is the change? Age is a Quantity -- and both onset and abatement have Age data types. In STU3 (and current build), the expressions are Condition.abatement.as(Age) and Condition.onset.as(Age).
@Michelle (Moseman) Miller thank you for clarification (i hate inheritance - always tricky :)
